value.title: Azure API for FHIR (Fast Healthcare Interoperability Resources) | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Michael Hansen joins Scott Hanselman to explain what FHIR is and how to get started with FHIR on Azure. Fast Healthcare Interoperability Resources (or, FHIR) is a new standard for representing and exchanging healthcare data. Developed by the HL7 community to address problems with interoperability, pieces

value.title: How to choose which services to use in Azure | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: In this video, Azure MVP Barry Luijbregts chats with Scott Hanselman about how he goes about choosing the right services in Azure to run his applications and store his data. value.title: How to set up an Azure pipeline with Node JS | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn how to create an Azure Pipeline for a Node.js application. Setting up a continuous integration process that automatically builds and tests your node.js code is very easy with Azure pipelines.   For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips

value.title: How to use Azure Bastion to connect securely to your Azure VMs | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Using a bastion host can help limit threats such as port scanning and other types of malware targeting your VMs. Ashish Jain joins Scott Hanselman to show how Azure Bastion gives you secure and seamless RDP and SSH access to your virtual machines. Now you can securely access your VMs over SSL from the

value.title: Implement serverless APIs with Azure Functions and Azure API Management | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Jeff Hollan joins Scott Hanselman to show how you can quickly deploy and manage your Serverless API's using OpenAPI and API Management.  0:00 – Overview 0:40 – OpenAPI definition (fka Swagger) 2:15 – Using API Management to build an OpenAPI definition 3:48 – Reviewing the generated OpenAPI definition

value.title: Azure for the Data Engineer
value.excerpt: This learning path guides data engineers through the evolving benefits your organization gains with Azure cloud data platform technologies.

topItems.title: Understand the evolving world of data
topItems.excerpt: Discover how data systems and roles are evolving and explore the differences between on-premises and cloud data solutions using sample business cases.

topItems.title: Survey the services on the Azure Data platform
topItems.excerpt: Explore the broad array of Azure technologies that analyze text or images and relational, nonrelational, or streaming data.

topItems.title: Identify the tasks of a data engineer in a cloud-hosted architecture
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the responsibilities of a data engineer, how they relate to the jobs of other data and AI roles, and explore common data engineering practices.

value.title: Describe the capabilities of Microsoft compliance solutions
value.excerpt: Describe the capabilities of Microsoft compliance solutions

topItems.excerpt: Describe the compliance management capabilities in Microsoft

value.title: Allow users to reset their password with Azure Active Directory self-service password reset
value.excerpt: Learn how to allow users to reset their password with Azure Active Directory self-service password reset.

value.title: Analyze your Azure infrastructure by using Azure Monitor logs
value.excerpt: Use Azure Monitor logs to extract valuable information about your infrastructure from log data.

value.title: Choose a messaging model in Azure to loosely connect your services
value.excerpt: Learn how Azure's storage queues, event hubs, event grid, and service bus can improve your communication between devices.

value.title: Choose the right disk storage for your virtual machine workload
value.excerpt: Azure provides a variety of disk storage options for virtual machine workloads. Identify the features of capabilities of each type to ensure your application performs optimally.

value.title: Connect to virtual machines through the Azure portal by using Azure Bastion
value.excerpt: Learn how to deploy Azure Bastion to securely connect to Azure Virtual Machines directly within the Azure portal.

value.title: Manage and control traffic flow in your Azure deployment with routes
value.excerpt: Learn how to control Azure virtual network traffic by implementing custom routes.

value.title: Create custom roles for Azure resources with role-based access control (RBAC)
value.excerpt: Learn how to create custom roles for Azure resources with role-based access control (RBAC).

value.title: Describe the compliance management capabilities in Microsoft
value.excerpt: Describe the compliance management capabilities in Microsoft

value.title: Enabling digital transformation
value.excerpt: Digital transformation is a wave of business innovation fueled by the explosion of technology—data, applications, and devices are everywhere. The cloud, artificial intelligence (AI), and the internet of things (IoT) give organizations new ways to make sense of information and generate insights to transform their business. Realizing the benefits of digital transformation requires business leaders to look beyond technology to reimagine existing business models and embrace a different way of bringing together people, data, and processes to create value for customers.

value.title: Understand the evolving world of data
value.excerpt: Discover how data systems and roles are evolving and explore the differences between on-premises and cloud data solutions using sample business cases.

value.title: Explore data storage and processing in Azure
value.excerpt: Explore data storage and processing in Azure

value.title: Get started with Azure DevOps
value.excerpt: Explore Azure DevOps capabilities and get started setting up your own organization knowing what separates elite performers from low performers.

value.title: Host your domain on Azure DNS
value.excerpt: Learn how to host your domain on Azure DNS.

value.title: Introduction to Azure Kubernetes Service
value.excerpt: Get acquainted with the Azure Kubernetes open-source container-orchestration system for automating application deployment, scaling, and management.

value.title: Introduction to high-performance computing (HPC) on Azure
value.excerpt: Discover the services available on Azure for your high-performance computing workloads.

value.title: Simplify access and identity provisioning with Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn about identity governance and how you can safeguard access to your organization’s data.

value.title: Manage access to an Azure subscription by using Azure role-based access control (RBAC)
value.excerpt: Learn how to assign management access to a subscription by using Azure role-based access control.

value.title: Prepare your development environment for Azure development
value.excerpt: Learn how to choose and install the appropriate IDE for your requirements to help you build, deploy, monitor, and scale cloud-hosted solutions.
